{{also|kiosk}} ==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|de|fr|kiosque}}, from {{der|de|it|chiosco}}, from {{der|de|ota}}, from {{der|de|fa|کوشک|tr=kōšk}}. Compare also modern {{cog|tr|köşk||pavillion}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈkiːɔsk/}} * {{audio|de|De-Kiosk.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Kiosks|gen2=Kioskes|gen3=Kiosk|Kioske}} # [[kiosk#English|kiosk]] # [[convenience store]] ====Synonyms==== * {{l|de|Bude}}, {{l|de|Büdchen}} * {{l|de|Späti}} {{qualifier|regional, eastern Germany}} * {{l|de|Trinkhalle}} {{qualifier|regional, Ruhrgebiet}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
